Let try this--from C to F: from formula F=1.8C+32=2C-.2C+32; for 100degree in C. ; 2x100-.2x100+32>>200-20+32=212 so F=212, easy multiplication and adding. Mentally do this: 2x 100 to get 200 and minus .2x100=20 right away and add 32 to it to get 180+32.Now for from F to C;  formula, C=(5/9)x(F-32) and for F=102, high fever; >>(5/9)x(F-32)=(10/18)x(F-32)=((9/18)+(1/18))x(F-32)=~(.5)x(F-32) + (1/~20)(F-32)=~.5x(102-32) + .05(102-32)=~35+3.5=~38.5C ---mentally do this 102-32 n get 70 n 70 divided by 2 to get 35 C really fast and add 3.5C to get approximate 38.5C n you know it is a little higher by .5 at least for 100F range, so add your final by 0.5C to give 39C. This way you can impress your brothers, sisters, mom and dad and your friends.

Everything had it's own base,12,36, 5280, 6, 8, 40, 14, and more. That from just Europe alone. The other world's cultures and bring in a whole lot more. All from medieval times.  This is the 21st century of science and math. Metric is the official system of measurement for science and world commerce of now for decades to centuries. Get with the program.
